Package com.wavemoney.assessment.service

Interface PathService

All Known Implementing Classes:
AStarPathServiceImpl, BFSPathServiceImpl
@Service public interface PathService
The PathService interface defines methods for finding the shortest path in a 2D grid.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final int[][]
    DIRECTIONS
    Array representing directions: right, down, left, up.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Path
    findShortestPath(int[][] grid)
    Finds the shortest path from the top-left corner to the bottom-right corner of the 2D grid.

  • Field Details

    • DIRECTIONS

      static final int[][] DIRECTIONS
      Array representing directions: right, down, left, up. Each direction is represented by a pair of integers: [deltaRow, deltaCol].

  • Method Details

    • findShortestPath

      Path findShortestPath(int[][] grid)
      Finds the shortest path from the top-left corner to the bottom-right corner of the 2D grid.
      Parameters:
      grid - The 2D grid represented as an array of integers. 0 represents an obstacle that cannot be crossed, and 1 represents a cell that can be traversed.
      Returns:
      A Path object representing the shortest path found in the grid.
